title: Pidikuthey Thirumba Thirumba Unnai Lyrics Sigaram Thodu

Anbe
Un Kaigal Theenda
Hormonegal Moongil Aaga
Sangeedham Pidikudhey
Sandhosham Vedikkudhae.

Sonnayae
Neril Vandhu Nee
Enakku Devadhai.
Edhilumae
Unnai Arigiraen Anbae
Unadhu Ninaivil
Ennaiyum Pidikkudhae

Kannadi Pondra Nenjil
Kann Erindhu Pogiraai
Vaazhaadha Naalai Kooda
Saerthu Vaazha Vaikkiraaai.

Arugilae Nirkum
Aruvi Nee Anbae
Unadhu Azhagil
Nanaiya Pidikudhey
Pidikudhey Pidikudhey

seo.description: Get the complete Pidikuthey Thirumba Thirumba Unnai Lyrics Sigaram Thodu from Sigaram Thodu. Read the lyrics penned by Yugabharathi and composed by D Imman and sung by Jithan Raj. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
